C:/nxpdrv/LPC1700CMSIS/Examples/UART/RS485_Slave/rs485_slave.c File Reference

This example used to test RS485 functionality on UART1 of LPC1768.In this case, RS485 function on UART1 acts as SLave on RS485 bus. More...

#include "lpc17xx_uart.h"

#include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"

#define UART_RING_BUFSIZE   256
#define __BUF_MASK   (UART_RING_BUFSIZE-1)
#define __BUF_IS_FULL(head, tail)   ((tail&__BUF_MASK)==((head+1)&__BUF_MASK))
#define __BUF_WILL_FULL(head, tail)   ((tail&__BUF_MASK)==((head+2)&__BUF_MASK))
#define __BUF_IS_EMPTY(head, tail)   ((head&__BUF_MASK)==(tail&__BUF_MASK))
#define __BUF_RESET(bufidx)   (bufidx=0)
#define __BUF_INCR(bufidx)   (bufidx=(bufidx+1)&__BUF_MASK)

UART_RING_BUFFER_T rb

Detailed Description

This example used to test RS485 functionality on UART1 of LPC1768.In this case, RS485 function on UART1 acts as SLave on RS485 bus.
